mapper.select: select uid, nick from chat_user cu INNER JOIN ( SELECT uid_buser AS user_id, create_time FROM chat_relation WHERE uid_auser = #{uid} UNION SELECT uid_auser AS user_id, create_time FROM chat_relation WHERE uid_buser = #{uid} ORDER BY create_time DESC ) as tmp ON cu.uid = tmp.user_id where cu.uid != #{uid}
